DOC.brief_summary: Can participant enhance gluteus maximus recruitment single-leg squat test follow neuromuscular train program ?
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion female healthy , active individual age 1836 walk without assistive device able run , jump , squat without difficulty show evidence hip muscle dysfunction screen exam Exclusion criterion history knee ligament injury , knee surgery , patella dislocation knee pain traverse stair , squat prolonged sit within 6 month test joint line tenderness suggestive meniscus pathology positive knee ligament stress test
